definition: The term "akademisch" refers to something that is related to or characteristic of the academic environment, typically associated with higher education institutions, research, or scholarly pursuits. It is commonly used to describe activities, behaviors, or qualities that are intellectual, scholarly, or pertaining to the academic world.

examples.german: Sie ist eine akademische Expertin auf diesem Gebiet.
examples.english: She is an academic expert in this field.

examples.german: Die Universität bietet verschiedene akademische Programme an.
examples.english: The university offers various academic programs.

examples.german: Er ist ein akademischer Mitarbeiter an der Hochschule.
examples.english: He is an academic staff member at the university.

examples.german: Die Forschungsergebnisse wurden in einer akademischen Zeitschrift veröffentlicht.
examples.english: The research results were published in an academic journal.
